content: Project {{ doc.name }} for {{ doc.project_name }} has a due date of {{ doc.expected_end_date }}. Take necessary actions to complete it ASAP

subject: {{ doc.expected_end_date }}  is the due date of {{ doc.name }} - {{doc.project_name}}

subject: {{ doc.exp_end_date }}  is the due date of {{ doc.name }} for {{ doc.customer }}  - {{doc.subject}}

content:
Dear {{ doc.director_name }},
Your Digital Signature will expire on {{ doc.expiry_date }}.

subject: Your Digital Signature will expire on {{ doc.expiry_date }}

content:
Dear Director,

subject: Today is the due date of {{ doc.customer }}  - {{doc.subject}}

content:

content:
